.. dropdown:: **mean** |subTitle| Average the OPD and T images of a list of *ImageQLSI* objects. |/subTitle|

    .. raw:: html
      
        <p class="title">Synthax</p>
    

    .. code-block:: matlab

        obj = objList.mean();
        
    .. raw:: html
      
        <p class="title">Description</p>

    Average the ``OPD`` and ``T`` images of a list of *ImageQLSI* objects ``objList``, aand retur a newn single *ImageQLSI* object with these averaged images.
